original_text: The arrow in his right hand shows him that he should go to Jerusalem. He will command his army to go and kill the people there. His soldiers will use heavy pieces of wood to knock down the walls and gates of the city. They will shout as they attack the city. They will build heaps of earth against the city's walls. The arrow in his right hand shows him that he should go to Jerusalem. He will command his army to go and kill the people there. His soldiers will use heavy pieces of wood to knock down the walls and gates of the city. They will shout as they attack the city. They will build heaps of earth against the city's walls.
korean_text: 오른손에 예루살렘으로 갈 점괘를 얻었으므로 공성퇴를 설치하며 입을 벌리고 죽이며 소리를 높여 외치며 성문을 향하여 공성퇴를 설치하고 토성을 쌓고 사다리를 세우게 되었나니

sentences.original_text: The arrow in his right hand
shows him that he should go to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 예루살렘으로 가야 한다는 것을 보여준다

sentences.original_text: to go and kill the people there
His soldiers will use heavy pieces of wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 병사들은 무거운 나무 막대들을 사용할 것이다

sentences.original_text: to knock down the walls and gates of the city
They will shout as they attack the city
They will build heaps of earth
